directions: Combine avocado, radishes, cilantro, olive oil, lime juice, lemon juice, salt, and pepper in a bowl. Mash roughly, leaving a few chunks of avocado.
Toast bread until it is nice and crispy, about 2 minutes. Spread avocado mixture evenly over the bread. Add sprouts and season with salt.
ingredients: 3 tablespoons minced cilantro, or to taste
1 dash salt and ground black pepper to taste
½ cup alfalfa sprouts, or to taste
title: Lemony Avocado Toast
